mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(student_id, full_name, name_pronunciation, nickname, email, area, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{fullName}, #{namePronunciation}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses(student_id, course, start_date, deadline) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{course}, #{startDate}, #{deadline})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET full_name = #{fullName}, name_pronunciation = #{namePronunciation}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, area = #{area}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
UPDATE students_courses SET course = #{course} WHERE attending_id = #{attendingId}
